Summary: A roud vessell glowing white blue
divs: Sighting DetailsI was araiving home from work still in my car i slow down because the road is bumbpy, when i noticed with my left eye a light i rapidly turnd my head and see what clearly i identify as an alien vessell passing desending and then straight ,glowin white blue ,for abaut a second no sound , and lost track of it ,it pased through clouds and faded. It was abaut 150-200ft from my face ,,,aproximatly at80mph.y recogniced what it was and staid in shock scared and then felt overwelmd and paralized rapidly told my wife and comented on facebook then a friend told mi to report it. Ihave so many questions ,,,and feel gratfull for whitnesing this vessell pass thru,,,but scared
